backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor placeholder without logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature-evidence metadata linking quiz flow and score computation changes to specific frontend files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend component and config file.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind layers defining custom Valentine-themed CSS variables and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level component controlling navigation between welcome, quiz, result, and celebration views.
frontend/src/components/AudioToggle.tsx: UI button toggling global audio state using the useAudio hook.
frontend/src/components/ConfettiHeartsBu: Generates falling heart/confetti particles with optional continuous mode.
frontend/src/components/FloatingHeartsBa: Renders animated gradient and floating heart visuals for the app background.
frontend/src/components/QuestionCard.tsx: Displays a single quiz question and handles option selection with state reset on question change.
frontend/src/components/QuizFlow.tsx: Manages quiz progression, score updates, correct-answer celebrations, and calls onComplete at the end.
Wraps all screens with themed background, audio toggle, and footer.
frontend/src/data/valentineQuizQuestions: Exports the array of five quiz questions with options and correct answers.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudio.ts: Provides a Zustand-backed audio mute state and functions to play simple oscillator-based sounds for feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity React context with login, logout, and identity loading via Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder export indicating no backend queries are used.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and a pastel romantic theme with custom colors, animations, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/views/CelebrationScreen.tsx: Displays a celebratory screen with heart animations and plays a celebration sound.
frontend/src/views/NonPerfectResultScree: Shows a teasing result screen where the 'No' button shrinks on repeated clicks and prompts the user to accept.
frontend/src/views/PerfectResultScreen.t: Displays a perfect-score screen with celebratory visuals and a redeemable date coupon interaction.
frontend/src/views/WelcomeScreen.tsx: Renders the opening screen inviting the user to start the quiz.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom romantic color variables, extended theme options, and additional plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata for a Valentine-themed interactive quiz app, including UI/UX requirements, quiz content, and known issues. Indicates a fix request for a quiz flow bug and lists existing implemented features.
